channel.title: Losing item on death [PI]
channel.description: Whenever you die you lose the camel mask (7003), flippers (6666), ardougone cloak (15349), donator cape (13333), and berserker ring (i) (15220). How can I make it where if you die even if you are skulled and smited, you keep these items?

item.title: Losing item on death [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EvilscapeV3 EvilscapeV3
item.description:
@EvilscapeV3 wrote:

Easy stuff :P, but I am not going be mean, and leave no tips. So here is a complete spoon feeding.

In PlayerAssistant.java Find

So than simply add something kinda like this.

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerRing] == 773) { c.sendMessage("You got to keep your ring"); }

This bit of code for example would save the perfect ring from being lost upon death.

Now here is the other equipment list.

playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;

So now when you die, you get to keep the item, it stays equipped.

Read full topic

item.title: Losing item on death [PI]
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

Well, you could either use Tom’s cache suite to edit the wealth in the cache, or you could edit your loseitemsondeath() method to check your inventory or equipment for the items, and always keep them above others

Read full topic

item.title: Losing item on death [PI]
item.dc:creator: @austinx austinx
item.description:
@austinx wrote:

man this is exactly what i’m looking for…

Read full topic
